Title: The invisible (wo)man
Source: Digit. Dialogues and Community 2.0: After Avatars, Trolls and Puppets
Abstract: This chapter presents an interview with the librarian, Nazlin Bhimani. She presents her models and strategies for academics and students to improve their engagement with online resources. © 2012 Woodhead Publishing Limited All rights reserved.
